item.title: Adding a user to your server
item.description: Why I am writing this blog? I am writing this blog because I a tired of forgetting how to do this. I do not add users to my server very often. As such, every time I do so, I do it incorrectly and the new user is either not in the sudoer group, the user has no home directory, or that user cannot be logged into via ssh. Requirements: Create a new user Set a password Have a home directory with skeleton files Be able to use sudo Can use ssh to log in Use the “adduser” command My linux box, running ubuntu, has two commands that can be used to created users; useradd and adduser.
